Gap Description: No documentation on integrating zipBoard with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or other CI/CD pipelines for automated feedback collection.
Lack of detailed accessibility audit procedures and WCAG compliance testing instructions for reviewers using zipBoard.
Insufficient coverage of AdBlocker and browser extension troubleshooting steps, especially for the zipBoard extension on various browsers.
Missing detailed guidance on SSO configuration, IP whitelisting, and granular permission policies for enterprise accounts.
Suggested Title: Enterprise Security Settings and SSO Configuration

Gap Description: Limited examples and reference implementations for using webhooks and the zipBoard API to automate custom workflows and integrate with third‑party systems.
Suggested Title: Webhooks and API Automation Reference Guide
